title: Game of Thrones Skins?!
body:
I'd pay about $100 for a single skin.

Daenerys Shyvana?
Drogo Udyr?
Bran Malzahar? 
Oberyn Kalista?
Brienne Leona?

replies.body: It's not about your willingness to pay it's about the fact that riot isn't willing to pay for a lawsuit against copyright infringement
The skin wouldn't be that desirable to everyone, like myself (what is 'Game of Thrones'?)
